name: Terrawurm
description:
TerraWurm is a fast paced singleplayer arcade game. Collect precious gems on the hostile surface of Terra; the landscape is dangerous but what lurks beneath is even worse…

Grab as much as you can before you’re eaten by the TerraWurm!

Terrawurm has:
  • Super simple controls - just the left stick!
  • An ever changing landscape that will destroy you
  • Unlockable powerups to help level the playing field (until you eventually die)
  • Tough as nails challenges that only Hardcore Gamers™ can beat
  • A giant subterranean wurm that will eat you

If you love old school gaming, subterranean wurms and getting killed repeatedly then Terrawurm is made for you.
